articles.author: Tara Copp, Noah Robertson
articles.title: U.S. kills 4 alleged drug smugglers near Venezuela, Hegseth says - The Washington Post
articles.description: The U.S. strike near Venezuela is the latest in the Trump administration’s legally nebulous campaign targeting Latin American drug cartels.
articles.content: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said the U.S. military conducted another deadly strike on an alleged drug boat Friday, killing four people while questions remain as to the legal justification underpin… [+70 chars]
